description.narrative: The project will rehabilitate the pavement of about 157 km of roads in Kampong Chhnang, Kampong Speu, Prey Vang, and Svay Rieng. The rehabilitation program will provide a safer, climate-resilient, and cost-effective provincial road network with all-year access to markets and other social services for provincial centers of southeastern and Midwestern Cambodia.
